description:
After his falling out with Azusa, Yoto meets with her former classmates to learn what happened in her old school.  Afterwards, Yoto forcibly removes Azusa from her house with plans to knock her out of her depression. Tsukiko is preparing a picture story show for a preschool class and ask for Yoto opinion with hopes he would understand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashimu Mae ni Koe o Dase
